title: Request for next iteration of URF
body:
After playing URF for these past few weeks, there is one factor that really brings down the enjoyment of the mode.
The decently long list of champs that are to put simply overwhelming or almost impossible to beat in URF. 
Champs like Jax, Garen, Sylas, etc. 

My request is that next time the RGM devs looks at URF that they consider adding a ban phase. 
I know the intent of All Random is to create wildly different teams. However with the amount of rerolls available and being able to go back on a roll or pick up another players discarded champ means that it is easier to get the more powerful champs. So it is no longer truly random anymore.
